column7: To unlock this badge, you need to install more than 10 apps for your profile.

column6: Loves to chat with users on the site.
column7: To unlock this badge, you need to reply to any conversations for at least 150 times.
To unlock this badge, start a new conversation with 15 friends.

column6: Nobody can stop them from gossiping!
column7: To unlock this badge, invite more than 10 users into any existing conversation.

column6: You really love to leave conversations?
column7: To unlock this badge, leave more than 20 group conversations.

column6: Loves following other users on the site.
column7: To unlock this badge, follow more than 60 users from the site.
To unlock this badge, you need to have at least 60 new followers.
To unlock this badge, you need to remove more than 10 of your friends.

column6: Loves to build new friendships with others.
column7: To unlock this badge, you need to initiate more than 30 friend requests with other users on the site.

column6: Someone who loves to organize their friends.
column7: To unlock this badge, create 10 friend lists to organize your friends.
To unlock this badge, you need to upload 30 new photos on the site.
To unlock this badge, you need to browse more than 150 photos on the site.
To unlock this badge, you need to tag 50 people in different photos.
To unlock this badge, you need to be tagged by 50 of your friends in different photos.
To unlock this badge, you need to view at least 50 user profiles.

column6: Congrats on registering on the site!
column7: To unlock this badge, you need to register on this site.
To unlock this badge, you need to report for more than 20 times.
To unlock this badge, you need to search for more than 50 times.
To unlock this badge, you need to post at least 30 different story posts.
